Grid Systems

Working with grids, columns, and rows on guelph.ca

The primary grid system that is utilized by guelph.ca is the Bootstrap 3 Grid System. It includes predefined classes for easy layout options as well as mixins for varying screen sizes. For more information on using the grid system, please visit the Bootstrap 3 Documentation.

It is worth noting, that since the advent of CSS3, flexbox and css grid are also valuable tools in creating dynamic and predefined formats and grids.
